summary: Item 2. Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations. General Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc., and its consolidated subsidiaries (Marsh McLennan or the "Company") is a global professional services firm in the areas of risk, strategy and people. The Company helps clients build the confidence to thrive through the power of its four market-leading businesses. With annual revenue of over $24 billion, the Company has more than 90,000 colleagues advising clients in 130 countries.
